## Public Constructors

### FunctionPassManager() {#a6863d1a1103952a65546e85c320cf061}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::legacy::FunctionPassManager::FunctionPassManager (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42; M)</>}
  labels = {["explicit"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacy/functionpassmanager">FunctionPassManager</a> ctor - This initializes the pass manager.

Create new <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> pass manager.

It needs, but does not take ownership of, the specified <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### add() {#a1bec72c759c38b748ff60434eb4d0c80}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::legacy::FunctionPassManager::add (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> &#42; P)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Add a pass to the queue of passes to run.

This passes ownership of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacy/passmanager">PassManager</a>. When the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/legacy/passmanager">PassManager</a> is destroyed, the pass will be destroyed as well, so there is no need to delete the pass. This may even destroy the pass right away if it is found to be redundant. This implies that all passes MUST be allocated with &#39;new&#39;.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/legacypassmanager-h/#l00078">78</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/legacypassmanager-h">LegacyPassManager.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/legacypassmanager-cpp/#l01306">1306</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/legacypassmanager-cpp">LegacyPassManager.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### run() {#a02e592cc8ca8a049fbe052f809514c73}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::legacy::FunctionPassManager::run (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp; F)</>}>
run - Execute all of the passes scheduled for execution.

Keep track of whether any of the passes modifies the function, and if so, return true.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/legacypassmanager-h/#l00084">84</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/legacypassmanager-h">LegacyPassManager.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/legacypassmanager-cpp/#l01314">1314</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/legacypassmanager-cpp">LegacyPassManager.cpp</a>.
